message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm happy to buy it, but $110 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend. Would you be willing to do $105?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $108 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the benefits it brings.
